name: Henosis
description:
HENOSIS™ is a mysterious 2D Platform Puzzler where players are propelled into weird and visceral worlds as they take control of a small, viscous blue blob while overcoming obstacles and enemies throughout each level.

The Player must venture through each world as it collects precious water tokens in order open the exit portal and restore vitality to its drought-ridden home world.

  • Traverse your way through 27 hand-crafted levels
  • Unique player mechanics
  • Battle menacing bosses across 3 distinct worlds
  • Original artwork & animation
  • Full controller support

Controls


While it is possible to leverage a keyboard, player manoeuvrability does require a fair bit of accuracy so we recommend that you use an Xbox Controller or similar model instead.

ESC: Pause Game
Space: Jump/Zip
E: Fire/Plant Bomb
Q: Activate Time Slow
Left Arrow Key: Move Left
Right Arrow Key: Move Right

Tips:


  • Patience is Key! Keep in mind that you only have 1 HP and much of your movement will depend greatly on timing.
  • Watch the movement and speed of enemies or periodic bursts from vents.
  • Use the Time Slow ability to get round tricky obstacles.
  • Bombs help to take out weak structures and Bosses.
